whatIs.title: What is the Amharic Translator?
whatIs.description: The VibeTrans English to Amharic Translator is an AI workspace tuned to Ethiopia's formal register, Ge'ez script, and modern slang. Upload Word files, chat threads, or call transcripts and receive polished Amharic plus optional Latin transliteration. Built-in review cues help bilingual teams finalize messaging before sharing it with customers, ministries, or diaspora communities. It keeps date formats, honorifics, and place names consistent across every export.

howto.title: How to translate English to Amharic
howto.description: Follow these guided steps to turn English drafts into accurate Amharic copy that is ready to publish or send.
howto.imageAlt: How to translate English to Amharic steps

steps.title: Collect Your Source Material
steps.description: Gather English messages, proposals, or transcripts from email, chat, or .docx files. The uploader keeps original formatting intact, detects numbers and currency, and prepares the text so the AI can preserve business tone automatically for every paragraph.

steps.title: Select Context Mode
steps.description: Choose formal government, business, support, or creative storytelling mode. Each option loads curated Amharic phrase banks, honorifics, and transliteration rules so your message lands with the right level of respect and warmth for the recipient.

steps.title: Translate and Collaborate
steps.description: Hit Translate to receive Amharic script plus optional latin transliteration. Mention teammates for review notes, highlight segments needing legal approval, and let the AI suggest tone adjustments before you finalize the customer-ready draft for your chosen channel.

steps.title: Deliver and Measure
steps.description: Export polished Amharic copy as text, Word, or CSV, or trigger webhook delivery into your CRM. Enable real-time analytics to track glossary usage, reviewer comments, and delivery status so every campaign stays aligned with stakeholders across Ethiopia and abroad.

items.title: Ge'ez Script with Living Rhythm
items.description: Amharic grew from the ancient Ge'ez abugida, blending Semitic roots with modern innovations—each glyph already encodes consonant and vowel sounds, so accurate spacing and tone keep the written message musical and clear.

items.title: Language of Business and Culture
items.description: Over 32 million native speakers use Amharic across Ethiopia, embassies, churches, and diaspora media, making it essential for contracts, tourism, community outreach, and cultural storytelling that needs respectful, localized nuance.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Quick answers before you launch your next English to Amharic project

item-1.question: Can the translator keep honorifics and formal phrasing?
item-1.answer: Yes. Choose a formal preset and VibeTrans maintains titles, respectful greetings, and closing lines that match Ethiopian business etiquette.

item-2.question: Does it support transliteration for learners?
item-2.answer: Enable transliteration mode to display Latin script alongside Amharic output so bilingual reviewers and learners can confirm pronunciation quickly.

item-3.question: How do we collaborate on large documents?
item-3.answer: Upload .docx files, add reviewers, and track inline comments. Approvals sync back to your CMS or cloud drive automatically.

item-4.question: Is there an API for existing platforms?
item-4.answer: Absolutely. Use the REST API or webhook triggers to push translations into help centers, CRM automations, or SMS campaigns without manual copy-paste.

item-5.question: How is our data protected?
item-5.answer: Projects are encrypted at rest and in transit. Administrators can set retention windows, redact sensitive data, and audit every export.

item-6.question: Is the translator free to use?
item-6.answer: Yes. The English to Amharic translator offers free basic translations with premium features available for teams needing advanced collaboration tools.
